001import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
002import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
003import javax.swing.JPanel;
004import javax.swing.JLabel;
005import javax.swing.JDialog;
006import java.util.ArrayList;
007import java.awt.Color;
008import java.awt.BorderLayout;
009
010/**
011 * Décrivez votre classe TradeButton ici.
012 *
013 * @author (votre nom)
014 * @version (un numéro de version ou une date)
015 */
016public class DropButton extends PopupButton implements ActionListener {
017    private UserInterface aUI;
018    private MC aMC;
019    
020    private JDialog aDialog;
021    private JPanel aMainPanel;
022    private JPanel aButtonPanel;
023    private JPanel aItemPanel;
024    private JPanel aItemLabelPanel;
025    private JPanel aItemCenterPanel;
026    // private JPanel aSelectedPanel;
027    
028    private JLabel aItemLabel;
029    // private JLabel aSelected;
030    // private JLabel aTarget;
031    
032    private Color aBGColor;
033    private Color aTextColor;
034    private Color aHoverBGColor;
035    private Color aHoverTextColor;
036    
037    private ArrayList<String> aItems;
038    
039    private ConfirmButton aConfirmButton;
040    private CancelButton aCancelButton;
041    
042    public DropButton(final String pText, final UserInterface pUI) {
043        super(pText);
044        
045        this.aUI = pUI;
046        this.aMC = this.aUI.getGE().getMC();
047        
048        this.aBGColor = new Color(56, 51, 51);
049        this.aTextColor = new Color(245, 240, 240);
050        this.aHoverBGColor = new Color(45, 40, 40);
051        this.aHoverTextColor = new Color(155, 150, 150);
052        
053        this.aItemLabel = new JLabel("Objets :");
054        this.aItemLabel.setForeground(Color.white);
055        // this.aSelected = new JLabel("Selectionné : ");
056        // this.aSelected.setForeground(Color.white);
057        // this.aTarget = new JLabel("");
058        // this.aTarget.setForeground(Color.white);
059        
060        this.aItems = new ArrayList<String>();
061        
062        this.addActionListener(this);
063    }
064    
065    @Override
066    public void actionPerformed(final ActionEvent pE) {
067        PopupButton.COMMAND_WORD = this.getText();
068        this.createDialog();
069    }
070    
071    private void createDialog() {
072        this.setPossibleItems();
073        
074        this.aDialog = new JDialog(this.aUI.getFrame(), JDialog.ModalityType.APPLICATION_MODAL);
075        this.aDialog.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
076        
077        this.aMainPanel = new JPanel();
078        this.aMainPanel.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
079        this.aMainPanel.setBackground(new Color(20, 0, 0));
080        
081        // Panel des boutons confirmer et annuler
082        this.aButtonPanel = new JPanel();
083        this.aButtonPanel.setBackground(this.aBGColor);
084        
085        // panel avec les boutons des items
086        this.aItemPanel = new JPanel();
087        this.aItemPanel.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
088        this.aItemPanel.setBackground(new Color(4, 51, 86));
089        
090        // panel pour le label Item
091        this.aItemLabelPanel = new JPanel();
092        this.aItemLabelPanel.add(this.aItemLabel);
093        this.aItemLabelPanel.setBackground(new Color(4, 51, 86));
094        
095        this.aItemPanel.add(this.aItemLabelPanel, BorderLayout.NORTH);
096    
097        //
098        // this.aSelectedPanel = new JPanel();
099        // this.aSelectedPanel.setBackground(new Color(23, 26, 29));
100        // this.aSelectedPanel.add(this.aSelected);
101        // this.aSelectedPanel.add(PopupButton.TARGET);
102        
103        // this.aItemPanel.add(this.aSelectedPanel, BorderLayout.SOUTH);
104        
105        // this.aConfirmButton = new ConfirmButton("Confirmer", this.aDialog, this.aUI);
106        this.aCancelButton = new CancelButton("Annuler", this.aDialog, this.aUI);
107        
108        // this.aButtonPanel.add(this.aConfirmButton);
109        this.aButtonPanel.add(this.aCancelButton);
110        
111        this.aMainPanel.add(this.aItemPanel, BorderLayout.CENTER);
112        this.aMainPanel.add(this.aButtonPanel, BorderLayout.SOUTH);
113        
114        this.aItemCenterPanel = new JPanel();
115        
116        this.addButtons();
117        
118        this.aDialog.add(aMainPanel, BorderLayout.CENTER);
119        this.aDialog.setSize(500, 300);
120        this.aDialog.setUndecorated(true);
121        this.aDialog.setLocationRelativeTo(null);
122        
123        this.aDialog.setVisible(true);
124    }
125    
126    private void addButtons() {
127        for(String vItemName : this.aItems) {
128            this.aItemCenterPanel.add(new TargetButton(vItemName, this.aUI, this.aDialog));
129        }
130        this.aItemPanel.add(this.aItemCenterPanel, BorderLayout.CENTER);
131    }
132    
133    private void setPossibleItems() {
134        this.aItems.clear();
135        if(!this.aMC.getItemList().empty()) {
136            for(String vItemName : this.aMC.getItemList().getItems().keySet()) {
137                if(!this.aItems.contains(vItemName))
138                    this.aItems.add(vItemName);
139            }
140        }
141    }
142}
